outputs.output_descr: The main objective of the project is to develop strong and vital economy in Poland and suggest possible models for replication in other Eastern European countries.

The project will address a major challenge in regards of professional skills and qualifications of young labour force in rural areas by developing rural schools capacities to provide high quality vocational training. UNDP role in the project, in cooperation with partners, is the substantial coordination and consulting of all activities, monitoring the tasks implementation, building the network of experts and partners within the sustainable rural development; promotion & dissemination of the project, substantial evaluation of the project results and elaborating the report with recommendations for decisions makers in charge of rural vocational education (Ministry of Education, Ministry of Rural Development)

Social and professional readaptation of people with hearing impairment on the labor market through advisory activities, professional courses, internships and creation partnerships for social economy entities. The horizontal programme on national level, to improve chances of accessing or returning to work market for deaf. In the program tested and new tools of workplace integration, also piloted component of social economy - partnerships for social entreprises for deaf persons.
Maintenance of Warsaw Project office including salaries of Operations Associate, Programme Coordinator, Administrative Assistant  and office maintenance costs
Platform for regional exchange of knowledge in social innovation and poverty reduction to be established and new programmatic areas to be  developed in middle income countries in the region

The main objective of the project is to increase the capacity of public, private and civil society actors in area of  human development challenges through evidence-based, inclusive and sustainable policies because of a new policy oriented measure.

The project is focused on academic cooperation and exchange of good practices between Poland and India. Overall objective of the action is the intensification and creation of sustainable links in the field of higher education between Europe and India.

project_descr: Social innovation in Europe and CIS
project_title: Social innovation in Europe and CIS
